permafrost.tundra.lang

Class BooleanHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • permafrost.tundra.lang.BooleanHelper

  • public class BooleanHelper
extends java.lang.Object
    A collection of convenience methods for working with booleans.

      • format

        public static java.lang.String format(java.lang.String inString,
                                      java.lang.String inTrueValue,
                                      java.lang.String inFalseValue,
                                      java.lang.String outTrueValue,
                                      java.lang.String outFalseValue)
        Formats the given boolean string using the given output boolean values.
        Parameters:
        inString - The string to be formatted.
        inTrueValue - The value used to determine if the string represents the boolean value true.
        inFalseValue - The value used to determine if the string represents the boolean value false.
        outTrueValue - The value returned if the given boolean is true.
        outFalseValue - The value returned if the given boolean is false.
        Returns:
        The given string reformatted.
